website_summaries.verdict: This well-rounded Razor outperforms pricier counterparts — and costs a fraction of the price.
pros: The spark feature is tons of fun for kids
Adjustable handle to accommodate younger or shorter users
cons: The handle does not adjust very high and may be uncomfortable for taller users
The spark cartridge does not last very long

customer_reviews.title: And the thing which makes sparks is good only for 11 stops
customer_reviews.text: It is not true that it is for 8+ , I've ordered razor kick scooter for 5 years old daughter and this one razor spark for my 11 years old son. They are the same size. The adjustable handle have only one slot as a scooter for 5 years old. So 11 years old can't ride it normally. And the thing which makes sparks is good only for 11 stops, than it just wearing out. Doesn't worse money.
customer_reviews.author: daria

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this scooter for my 9 year old grandson's Christmas. It's well made and easy for him to ride. He loves the sparks!
customer_reviews.author: GoGo

customer_reviews.title: CHILD LOVES IT!  SPARKS DONT LAST MORE THAN A DOZEN TIMES
customer_reviews.text: CHILD IS HAPPY SO WE ARE HAPPY. SPARKER ONLY LASTS TEN MINUTES
customer_reviews.author: Namo

customer_reviews.title: No spark replacement cartridges available.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this scooter a few weeks ago. My son loves it and it is really cool to see him ride it. BUT... a couple of days ago our son came home and the mechanism that makes the sparks had fallen off. The problem is that It is impossible to locate a replacement for this scooter (I checked more than a dozen vendors online). My son was really sad and disappointed with this outcome. If you cant locate replacement cartridges, I would suggest to avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gerasimos Fergadiotis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sparks don't last long before you have to buy a $25 replacement
customer_reviews.author: Autumn J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson Loves it. The price was best of the rest. Quality remained the same
customer_reviews.author: James R. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Loads of fun for my son. Very short life on the spark cartridges
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Cool Kid
customer_reviews.text: The spark makes it the best! Order plenty of refill cartridges....
customer_reviews.author: Portuguess Princess

customer_reviews.title: Seriously cool!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons birthday and he rides it everyday!! The sparks are really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter.
customer_reviews.text: Really a great scooter. Slick, compact design, yet have enough space on board. Runs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Md. M.

customer_reviews.title: Sparks flying everywhere!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves it!!! He rides it everyday that it's warm enough to play outside. It was delivered just as pictured and the sparks are plenty!!! It folds for easy storage and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this scooter
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this scooter, even I do, I took it for a ride and it is fun seeing the sparks going on while braking lol.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Too small and can't adjust!
customer_reviews.text: This is marketed for age 8+. I bought for my 11 yo son who is a little 5 ft tall and this is too small. The handlebar does not adjust upwards, so it is essentially one size does not fit all. His foot (size 10) in a sneaker barely fits on the scooter. Not happy with this at all.
customer_reviews.author: E. Botsford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sparks are great, has a lot of fun riding it. Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.author: Kelly OHanlon

customer_reviews.title: Great step up from plastic scooter
customer_reviews.text: Super great step up from a “baby scooter “. The sparks are fun and easy to ride even if not most athletic child. Perfect for us. Folds easily and light enough for her to carry herself
customer_reviews.author: Susan Reiser

customer_reviews.title: Prepare kids the spark is temporary
customer_reviews.text: The spark cartridge only lasted a few hours. Had to hunt online to find replacement cartridges. Plus the back area where the spark cartridge goes is now bent and we can't find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scooter
customer_reviews.text: My son loved his scooter. Issue was the spark strip runs out quick and my son actually has the metal spark holder fall off so it no longer hold spark strips.
customer_reviews.author: Jen719

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Price was great and cheaper than retail and has held up to 10 year old son refills are not too expensive at 2 for 20. Great gift comes in easy to handle box and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: gayla

customer_reviews.title: replacement scooter
customer_reviews.text: Replaced same scooter from 2 years ago. Not much more $ than buying replacement sparkers. Also old scooter was beginning to wear out from use.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Spark is fun -- buy replacements now because your kid is going to love this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old neighbor. He absolutely loved it!! Only thing I was confused about was the hand grips are made to come off. I have no idea why. When he rides it he accidentally hits the button and they fall out.
customer_reviews.author: susan ondrejka

customer_reviews.title: the sparks were a big hit
customer_reviews.text: 6yo loves it. the sparks are bigger and brighter than i expected. it's a great bargain for the price. very sturdy. the whole family has taken a turn on it.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Cockfield

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and his friends love play with it. The brakes and extra fun. But I have to say the brakes do where off pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Oris

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this scooter. He had never been on a scooter but wanted one really bad. I read the reviews on several and felt good about this purchase. I still do! He loves being able to make sparks and has become very good at balancing on a scooter. Definitely get extra spark pads. You will need them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not story enough for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Order this scooter for my sons birth day in February 2020. After two weeks noticed that steering was off. So we fixed it by tying the bolt but it didn’t work. So now I can exchange since I missed the window by a week. :(
customer_reviews.author: Galina

customer_reviews.title: USED!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my daughter, as a present for Easter. Tonight, (night before Easter) I unbox the item, and it’s USED. The wheels were dirty, the “spark pad” in the back was clearly heavily worn. I’m absolutely appalled and disappointed for my daughter. Her sister will wake up with a new tricycle, and she’ll have a used scooter. Unreal.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: great little scooter. lots of fun with the spark attachment
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one of these we've purchased--one for each of our grandsons. They love them. They're easy to ride and very durable. Cool too!
customer_reviews.author: P. Eller

customer_reviews.title: Solid scooter.
customer_reviews.text: Works just as intended - nostalgia of childhood at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old was riding it within 5 minutes of it coming out of the box. Easy to put together and lots of fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: KS Dad

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son loved this scooter...I just have to find where to replace the sparks...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it. The spark thing wears out pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 three old now knows how to ride it. Wide platform works well.
customer_reviews.author: stever

customer_reviews.title: Razor only covers warranty to 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be great, however the spring ball that holds the handlebar in place broke off and Razor customer service told me that it’s only covered for 6 months, so I will have to buy a new handle bar. So unfortunate! I would not recommend this product without buying an extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: troy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a scooter
customer_reviews.text: That’s basicly it, it’s a scooter, how high do you expect? Oh and the sparks are cool but wear down fast, don’t worry about the sidewalks it dosent leave marks.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Levreau

customer_reviews.title: Warning...sparks had to be extinguished by an adult.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grandchild used this 3 times before it caught on fire. I know it is too late to return but take this review as a warning and do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rogen

customer_reviews.title: Nice smooth scooter
customer_reviews.text: Good scooter. My son really liked it. It really sparks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES it! Recommend for a 8-9 year old! It’s safe, too!
customer_reviews.author: Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Breaks within hours
customer_reviews.text: Broken after 1st use the spark plate broke off. Total waist of money
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Have had it a month and the spark mechanism has fallen off twice. The steering bar won't stay on, no matter how much we tighten the clamp. It has came off three times while my son was riding it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Crosson

customer_reviews.title: We love new idea
customer_reviews.text: Idea wins everything, but the spark will wear our fast, not cheap to buy.......
customer_reviews.author: Yung-Han Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great Scooter
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, son loves it since the holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Siilverback

customer_reviews.title: Buy extra sparking cartridges
customer_reviews.text: All of the kids in neighborhood want to ride this scooter. The sparks work great on 4th of July
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool scooter
customer_reviews.text: Seriously why wouldn’t you want to see “fire spark” come out from underneath you when riding? My 5yr old loved it! My 11 year old rides it & it seriously is pretty cool! (I’ve may of rode if once or twice- LOL) 😝
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Zuniga-Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This scooter was a big hit for my 6 YO grandson
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old grandson, and it is a HUGE hit. Handles well for new riders, and the sparks are VERY impressive. Not wimpy little sparks like I was expecting, but sparks big enough to thrill. Several friends in his neighborhood have requested this scooter for Christmas after seeing his.
customer_reviews.author: RabidReader

customer_reviews.title: I would suggest buying replacements for the sparks with your ...
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest buying replacements for the sparks with your scooter, as they run out fast with the excitement and constant use!
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Scooter Ever
customer_reviews.text: My sweet grandson said it was the coolest scooter he’d ever seen!
customer_reviews.author: Shanon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old nephew loves this, it was his Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Resist!

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my grandddaughter
customer_reviews.text: She loves this and it is compact and easy to store
customer_reviews.author: sheila R Parker

customer_reviews.title: 7 yr old boys dream come true.
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this for my son for a Christmas present, it was for the convenience factor of not having to go out Christmas shopping anymore. Let me tell you, I was quite pleased. The packaging was not beat up. It was easy to set up, and it came with an extra spark bar. This was the hit of the holiday.
customer_reviews.author: MaryLyss

customer_reviews.title: The "sparks" attachment is a great marketing idea as all the kids in my grandsons ...
customer_reviews.text: The "sparks" attachment is a great marketing idea as all the kids in my grandsons neighborhood really like this feature
customer_reviews.author: AnthonyJ Arjil

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my Grandso
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scooter for my grandson's 6th birthday. He's the envy of the neighborhood. He loves it and the only drawback I see with it is that the cartridge attachment that makes the "sparks" doesn't last very long. The scooter came with one attached plus an extra and they were used up within a couple weeks. The cartridges cost around $15 for 2 so it can become costly to keep replacing them. He doesn't seem to want to ride it unless he can dazzle the big kids on the block with the sparks. I think once the spark novelty wears off he'll be satisfied to just ride the scooter (hope so anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: A Grez
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is great..sturdy..nice color..easy for child to learn to ride
customer_reviews.author: Jesse JamesTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: and 5 loved these scooters not to mention the sparks
customer_reviews.text: My boys ages 8, 7, and 5 loved these scooters not to mention the sparks. They were easy to get out of the box and I love the fact that you can fold them down for easy traveling. I highly recommend these razors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson. It is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Top Scooter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scooter for boys because it makes the sport of riding a scooter much more exciting and fun. Even the girls want one. Kids under 10 will love it! Amazon had the best price and fastest delivery. Don't hesitate to order this scooter for your child.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kralik

customer_reviews.title: GO
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS FOR ONE OF MY GRANDSONS . HE FOUND IT PERFECT. ADJUSTABLE AND EASY TO FOLD. GRANDMA DID GOOD
customer_reviews.author: patsy t

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and he is having a blast. Be sure to purchase extra cartridges!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Falcone

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! Even the adults get to use it
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Even the adults get to use it. Kids absolutely love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: armywife

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 and this was far too small for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Arold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was a great gift. came fast he loves it
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: very cool
customer_reviews.text: I think this model is for kids under the age of 9. The deck is very short so if the kid has long feet it will not fit right. The sparks are really the highlight.The quality of the Razor is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: strawberry letter 23

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Received this package at record speed. The spark paddles wear out real fast,but it does come with 1 extra one, and you can opt to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: brian smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter,well made,grandson loved the sparks feature,loved the folding handle for carrying scooter and packing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is fake! Scooter came in a brown box ...
customer_reviews.text: This is fake ! Scooter came in a brown box ‘ NOT a real razor scooter box !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Razor scooters are garbage.
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old son is on about his fourth razor scooter since he was old enough to ride one. They don't last long, and I won't buy another one because they're so poorly made. On every scooter my kid has owned, the bearings or the ring bearings in the middle of the wheels always break, creating a "drag". Such garbage and I regret not spending more on a better scooter that costs more instead of four $40 pieces of junk Razors. The last one I bought was February of this year and it's been out of commission for at least the whole summer, maybe since spring.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Fancy name..basic scooter
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son saw this scooter on the Disney Channel commercials. What they don't tell you is that the "spark" cartridges are difficult if not impossible to reorder. My son loves this scooter, but for all the hype and massive price difference you only get two spark cartridges. Just be forewarned that once the sparks are out, all you have left is the basic model. As for its durability, it is great! You get a few colors to choose and it folds down neatly to throw in the back seat of your car or camper.
customer_reviews.author: A. Yaussy

customer_reviews.title: tangosteo
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the sparks feature of this scooter. It adds to the fun of riding it. Just caution the user not to use it in the house if you don't want to get on your knees and scrub the streaks it makes!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Iodice

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved the scooter; no problems with the scooter, except it was shipped in its original container with pictures of the scooter all over it and was glad that my grandson was not here when it was delivered--it would certainly have spoiled his surprise Christmas gift. HOWEVER, my order also included extra cartridges (three 2-pk Razor Spark cartridges which Amazon and/or Buy.com stated in the confirmation email sent to me acknowedges my two orders, the total charges for both items, and stated they would be shipped together, but were not. I'm still looking for delivery of the three 2-pk Razor Spark cartridges!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It came fully assembled and my son loves making it spark.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Coyle

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter, smooth fast wheels and even came with a spare spark cartridge. Took my son a little bit of time to figure out how to step on the spark lever without stepping on the brakes at the same time but he has a blast riding it through our neighborhood and parks. It's lightweight and folds down pretty small for storage and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son just loves this gift. The only problem is that it is kind of hard to fold when transporting but that doesn't take away that my son loved the scooter. And the sparks are a great add-on.
customer_reviews.author: Rene A. Montero

customer_reviews.title: Grandson's Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 5 year old grandson. He is loving it. His 12 year old sister loves it too and she has the electric Razor. He wants to ride it in the house. We have tile and wood floors downstairs so we've been letting him, but not doing the sparks inside. He is the envy of all the boys in the neighborhood. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Lira

customer_reviews.title: A SCOOTER FOR THE OLDER GRANDSON
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED A RAZOR SCOOTER FOR THE YOUNGER ONE, AGED 6. I WAS IMPRESSED WITH THE QUALITY AND COMPACTNESS OF THE SCOOTER. IT FOLDS UP SO YOU CAN STICK IT IN A SMALL CAR TRUNK. THIS ONE CAME IN A LARGER BOX, WITH THE SCOOTER PACKED INSIDE A SMALLER BOX. GOOD THING, SINCE THE LARGER BOX WAS DAMAGED. I EXPECT THIS ONE TO BE AS GOOD AS THE ONE WE PURCHASED EARLIER.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with spark scooter. Got it for 6 yr old's birthday and my 9 & 10 yr old have been fighting over it also. Only bad part is the "sparks" cartridge doesn't last too long. We went through 3 cartridges in the first 5 days- but this was also 3 kids riding it. Would definately purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Millsap

customer_reviews.title: I did not return it because my son love the spark
customer_reviews.text: Scooter size is too small for a 10 years old kid. I did not return it because my son love the spark device
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso A.

customer_reviews.title: 9-year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift that was ordered only a week before Christmas and Amazon delivered! On time and as expected. My 9 year old son loves this scooter by Razor and had been asking for it for almost two years! He took it outside about 5 minutes after opening his gifts and didn't come in until I called him for lunch! Another winner from Razor.
customer_reviews.author: D.A. Oken

customer_reviews.title: My seven-year-old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The scooter arrived on time, and there is no assembly required. We just got it out of the box and out the door my son went. He loves it! The sparks are fun.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Kids disappointed. Size small, sparks don't last long.
customer_reviews.text: This is meant for younger kids, not 8+... it's smaller than our Razor for 5+. Also, the spark cartridge lasted less than 2 days and looks terrible now (you can purchase new, but my kids rode the scooter probably less than 2 hours total and it's worn completely out, so we won't waste money on new ones). The sparks were very cool and the kids were impressed, but bummed about the size of the scooter. Disappointed, this is our 5th or 6th Razor item and we've never had such bad luck with size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hindbjorgen

customer_reviews.title: Fun scooter for our boys!!
customer_reviews.text: My boys loved the scooter for Christmas! The neighborhood childs loved it as well. The only draw back is that the sparks cartridge runs out quickly. After 2 days the sparks already ran out!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My son would give this 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This scooter was nearly impossible to find locally. Amazon was the only place we could find it this past Christmas. My son LOVES this scooter... me, ehh. Of course that's just the 'mom' in me because this thing shoots some serious sparks! This scooter does exactly what it advertises it will.
customer_reviews.author: portcitymom74

customer_reviews.title: poor machining, one handle doesn't fit (multiple units)
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get left handle bar into the post. Exchanged it, same exact problem with second one. Spent over an hour each time trying to get the left side out just so I can repackage it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Razor Spark Scooter
customer_reviews.text: My son, who is 8 1/2 yrs. loves this scooter. He specifically wanted this one. My only complaint is the spark cartage runs out quickly. The do provide on extra when you purchase the scooter. We went through one in less than a month!
customer_reviews.author: M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good scooter, bad spark.
customer_reviews.text: The scooter works just fine, but the spark ran out much too quickly. Now my son rides it inside because there's no spark.
customer_reviews.author: WindyGale

customer_reviews.title: Fun Scooter
customer_reviews.text: I gave the razor spark scooter 5 stars because my 7 year old daughter loves it. With every nice day we have, she grabs her scooter after school and rides it. It's very portable as well. Honestly, she doesn't use the sparks that much, but they work great. I've read other reviews that they run out quickly, I wouldn't know...she has so much fun riding around on it she forgets about the sparks. I probably could have saved a few dollars and just purchased the standard scooter, but this is what she had to have and it was the holidays :)
customer_reviews.author: N. Cotter

customer_reviews.title: fine
customer_reviews.text: I think this is only slightly larger than the one I just replaced, that we used from 5 years to 10 years and it looks almost exactly same. But it's shiney and my daughter likes the sparks which work really well. I never saw a commercial in advance so I had no expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mary jane

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift and he loves it. Was exactly what he wanted and he loves it. Great service and got exactly what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Powers

customer_reviews.title: son has too much fun
customer_reviews.text: My son has non stop fun on this scooter ! We've had other scooters by razor but th8s one seems a lot better, a wider foot base and seems like a better build as to previous models. Overall very happy and so is my son !
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Simple Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The scooter was purchased for my almost 6 year old daughter. She had been asking for one for sometime. I did not realize until the scooter arrived that the recommended age was 8 years old. With a little bit of practice and demonstration from mom, she was able to learn how to ride. It is a simple toy that provides hours of entertainment. It is easy to transport to the park. She has had a fun summer with it. Mom enjoys riding it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Sparky
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has other razors, but really wanted this one for the sparking feature; he's been enjoying it so much, but you have to keep buying refills in order to keep the sparking feature or else you have just another razor.
customer_reviews.author: WandaMich

customer_reviews.title: razor
customer_reviews.text: the wheels look a little worn but other than that its very nice and received in a timely manor. my nephew loves it
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: We love Razor scooters. This is a replacement for my son since my husband ran the other one over with his car. It's winter in the Midwest so it hasn't been used. Sure it will be just as good as the other one.
customer_reviews.author: A mom

customer_reviews.title: A happy boy
customer_reviews.text: Since it came out of the box my son has not stopped! This was his favorite gift for christmas. The sparks are bright and all of the neighborhood kids are wanting this scooter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun product!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. But the packaging of both outer carton and inner carton came to me smashed and opened so I could not give it as a wrapped gift.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Good and Durable one
customer_reviews.text: I have this scooter for my son from 4 years and its very good and durable one, The sparks are good and they gave an extra spark replacement also. overall he is happy and still using now and then..
customer_reviews.author: Vijay Chaganti

customer_reviews.title: Razor Sparking Scooter
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the kids in my family and they loved it. Kept running up and down the street with them sparking, adults had a go at it. All enjoyed the scooter.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great Scooter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 yr old son for his birthday and he loved it! It's a beautiful lil scooter and pretty fast also. My only concern is that the sparks did not last that long for the price I'm paying for them.
customer_reviews.author: Randy O.

customer_reviews.title: m so glad I bought this because he is having such a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just as advertised. I purchased it for my 8 yr. old Grandson and he absolutely loves it. He especially loves the "sparks" it makes. I,m so glad I bought this because he is having such a good time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fances E. Rickard

customer_reviews.title: son loves it
customer_reviews.text: got this for my 6 y/o and he loves it. sparks work great although you have to take the sticker off 1st---as he found out later. No issues yet. none expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a Hit!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it. He kept expressing these words as well as awesome! A real treat to see at night.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth shelor

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the Razor scooter
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love this scooter! I have even ridden it home after dropping the child off to school! Shhhhh. Hardy enough to withstand a lot of use and abuse!
customer_reviews.author: jnine

product_meta.title: Razor Spark Kick Scooter
feature_bullets: Scooter with foot controlled sparking mechanism
Additional Replaceable Spark cartridges also sold separately
Aircraft grade aluminum tube and deck
